rukus.text: 20|25|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora buku prasasta karai diya.
20|26|‘Arau mora kama sahaja karai diya
20|27|‘arau mora jibhara jarata dura karai diya
20|28|‘yate sihamte mora katha bujiba parae.
20|29|‘Arau mora paraiyalara paraa mora babe ejana sahayyakarai nirdharana karai diya
20|30|‘mora bha'i haraunaka
20|31|‘te'omra dbaraa mora sakti sudrrha karaa
20|32|‘arau te'omka mora kamata ansidara karaa
20|33|‘yate ami tomara bechi bechi tachabiha patha karaiba parao
20|34|‘arau adhika paraimane smarana karaiba parao.
20|35|‘Niscaya tumi amara samyaka drasta’.
20|36|Te'om ka’le, ‘he mucha! Tumi yi bicaraicha seya tomaka pradana karaa ha’la.
20|37|‘Arau arasye ami tomara prati arau ebara anugraha karaichilo
20|38|‘yetiya ami tomara makaka yi janabalagiya achila seya jana'ichilo

20|39|‘Ye, tumi iyaka bakacara bhitarata raakhi diya, tara pichata iyaka sagarata uturaa'i diya, yate sagarae iyaka paralai theli diye, phalata iyaka mora satraurae arau tara satraurae utha'i lai yaba. Ma'i mora phalara paraa tomara prati muhabbata dhali dichilo, arau yate tumi mora cakura agata pratipalita horaa’.

20|40|‘Yetiya tomara bayerae khoja karhi gai achila, tara pichata (yetiya gai pale) te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka ene karaobara sandhana dimane yiye e'i sisura dayitbabhara laba paraiba’? Phalata ami tomaka tomara matrra ocaralai ghuraa'i anilo, yate te'omra caku jura parae arau sokata bhani naparae, arau tumi ejana byaktika hatya karaichila; tathapi'o ami tomaka manokastara paraa mukti dichilo arau ami tomaka bahu paraiksa karaicho. He mucha! Tara pichata tumi ke'iba bacharao mada'inabasira majata arasthana karaichila, iyara pichata tumi nirdharaita samayata upasthita ha’la.
20|41|‘Arau ma'i tomaka mora nijara babe prastuta karai laicho.
20|42|‘Tumi arau tomara bha'i mora nidarsanasamuha lai yatraa karaa arau mora smaranara ksetrata kono dharanara alasata nakaraiba
20|43|‘tomaloke duyo phira'a'unara ocaralai yoraa, niscaya si simalanghana karaiche.
20|44|‘Tomaloke tara lagata komala bharae katha kaba, hayato si upadesa grahana karaiba athaba bhaya karaiba’.
20|45|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘he amara raba! Amara asanka haiche si amara lagata durbyarahara karaiba na'iba an'yaya acaranata simalanghana karaiba’.
20|46|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke bhaya nakaraiba, niscaya ma'i tomalokara lagata acho, ma'i suno arau dekhom’.

20|47|Eteke tomaloke tara ocarata yoraa arau koraa, ‘ami duyo tomara pratipalakara raachula, seye amara lagata bani icharaa'ilaka yabalai diya arau sihamtaka kasta nidiba, ami tomara ocarata tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa nidarsana lai ahicho; arau yisakale satpatha anusarana karae te'omlokara prati santi barsita ha'omka.
20|48|‘Niscaya amara prati ahi praerana karaa haiche ye, sasti kerala tara babe yiye micha araopa karae arau mukha ghuraa'i laya’.
20|49|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘he mucha! Teneha’le tomalokara raba kona’
20|50|mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi amara raba, yijane pratyeka bastuka upayukta akrti dana karaiche, tara pichata sathika patha nirdesa karaiche’.
20|51|Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘teneha’le atita yugara lokasakalara arastha ki’
20|52|mucha'i ka’le, ‘iyara jnana mora pratipalakara ocarata kitabata ache, mora pratipalake bhula nakarae arau bismrta'o nahaya’.

20|53|‘Yijane tomalokara babe prthiraikhanaka sayyaraupe parai diche arau tata tomalokara babe calara patha karai diche, arau teraemi akasara paraa pani barsana karae’. Phalata tara dbaraa ami bibhinna prakarara udbhida utpanna karao.
20|54|Tomaloke khoraa arau tomalokara gharaciya jantuborako caraoraa; niscaya iyata bibekasampanna byaktisakalara babe nidarsana ache.
